Uses of Package
org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.common.DCTM

  • Packages that use org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.common.DCTM 
    Package Description
    org.apache.manifoldcf.authorities.authorities.DCTM  
    org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.common.DCTM  
    org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.connectors.DCTM  
  • Classes in org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.common.DCTM used by org.apache.manifoldcf.authorities.authorities.DCTM 
    Class Description
    DocumentumException  
    IDocumentum
    This class abstracts away from the documentum methods necessary to "do things" that the crawler or authority needs to be done with the Documentum repository.
    IDocumentumObject
    This represents the limited equivalent of an IDfSysObject, containing only the properties that the crawler code needs to do its job.
    IDocumentumResult
    This interface represents a streamed resultset from a documentum DQL query.
  • Classes in org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.common.DCTM used by org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.common.DCTM
